computer-science.name: Introduction to Programming
computer-science.description: Fundamentals of programming and algorithms. Learn basic programming concepts, problem-solving techniques, and introductory data structures.

computer-science.name: Computer Systems Fundamentals
computer-science.description: Introduction to computer organization and architecture. Learn about digital logic, computer components, and low-level programming.

computer-science.name: Discrete Mathematics for CS
computer-science.description: Mathematical foundations for computer science. Cover logic, sets, relations, functions, and basic combinatorics.

computer-science.name: Web Development Fundamentals
computer-science.description: Introduction to web technologies. Learn HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to build interactive web applications.

mathematics.name: Calculus I
mathematics.description: Differential and integral calculus. Study limits, derivatives, integrals, and their applications.

mathematics.name: Linear Algebra
mathematics.description: Vector spaces and linear transformations. Explore matrices, determinants, eigenvalues, and vector spaces.

mathematics.name: Mathematical Reasoning
mathematics.description: Introduction to mathematical proof and reasoning. Learn logic, set theory, and proof techniques.

mathematics.name: Statistics I
mathematics.description: Introduction to statistical methods. Study probability, descriptive statistics, and basic inferential statistics.

computer-science-mathematics.name: Computational Mathematics
computer-science-mathematics.description: Mathematical computing and numerical methods. Learn numerical analysis, computational methods, and mathematical software.

computer-science-mathematics.name: Programming for Mathematics
computer-science-mathematics.description: Programming concepts with mathematical applications. Focus on algorithms for mathematical problem solving.

computer-science-mathematics.name: Calculus I
computer-science-mathematics.description: Differential and integral calculus. Study limits, derivatives, integrals, and their applications.

computer-science-mathematics.name: Discrete Structures
computer-science-mathematics.description: Mathematical structures for computer science. Cover logic, sets, relations, functions, and combinatorics.

business-administration.name: Principles of Management
business-administration.description: Introduction to management principles and practices. Learn about organizational behavior, leadership, and strategic planning.

business-administration.name: Financial Accounting
business-administration.description: Fundamentals of financial accounting. Study accounting principles, financial statements, and analysis.

business-administration.name: Marketing Principles
business-administration.description: Introduction to marketing concepts and strategies. Learn about market research, consumer behavior, and marketing mix.

business-administration.name: Business Statistics
business-administration.description: Statistical methods for business decision making. Study probability, descriptive statistics, and business applications.

psychology.name: Introduction to Psychology
psychology.description: Overview of psychological principles and research. Study cognition, emotion, development, and social behavior.

psychology.name: Research Methods in Psychology
psychology.description: Introduction to psychological research methods. Learn experimental design, data collection, and analysis.

psychology.name: Developmental Psychology
psychology.description: Study of human development across the lifespan. Explore physical, cognitive, and social development.

psychology.name: Biological Psychology
psychology.description: Introduction to the biological bases of behavior. Study brain structure, neurotransmitters, and physiological psychology.

general-education.name: Academic Writing
general-education.description: Development of academic writing skills. Focus on argumentation, research, and effective communication.

general-education.name: Public Speaking
general-education.description: Development of effective oral communication skills. Practice speech preparation, delivery, and audience analysis.

general-education.name: Introduction to Sociology
general-education.description: Study of human society and social behavior. Explore culture, socialization, and social institutions.

general-education.name: Environmental Science
general-education.description: Introduction to environmental systems and issues. Study ecosystems, resources, and sustainability.

general-education.name: Art Appreciation
general-education.description: Exploration of visual arts across cultures and historical periods. Develop critical analysis skills.

general-education.name: World History
general-education.description: Survey of world civilizations from ancient times to present. Examine cultural, political, and economic developments.
